item.title: Book Review: Wrist
item.description:
Wrist by Nathan Niigan Noodin Adler

Wrist is an Anishinaabe-inspired horror story that I picked up from the Ottawa Writersfest last year.

Adler keeps you guessing about whether this is playing out in the imagination of Church, the protagonist, even going so far as to have characters that themselves don’t believe.

flows with language

scientific

intergenerational trauma

some escape, some retreat
